answers.default: Firewall and Security - UnifyWeaver's firewall system controls access to external tools, network resources, and file operations. Features strict/permissive modes, whitelist/blacklist policies for domains and tools, and Python module restrictions. Uses fundamental policies like allowed_service/2 and network_access/1 to derive security rules.
answers.all-MiniLM-L6-v2: Firewall system: Controls tool/network access via policies. Supports strict/permissive modes, whitelisting, and Python module restrictions.
answers.e5-small-v2: Firewall Security - Control access to tools and network. Configure strict/permissive modes, whitelist domains, restrict Python modules. Uses fundamental policies to derive rules.

long: I need to restrict my pipeline to only access specific internal domains and block all other network traffic
How can I configure the firewall to allow specific external tools while denying others in a production environment?

answers.default: PowerShell Target - Compile Prolog predicates to PowerShell scripts using pure mode or Bash-as-a-Service (BaaS). Supports object pipelines, .NET bindings, and advanced joins. Use compile_to_powershell/3 with options like powershell_mode(pure|baas) and output_format(object).
answers.all-MiniLM-L6-v2: PowerShell target: compile_to_powershell/3. Supports pure/BaaS modes, object pipelines, and .NET bindings.
answers.e5-small-v2: PowerShell Target - Compile to PowerShell with pure/BaaS modes. Supports object pipelines, .NET bindings, advanced joins. Use compile_to_powershell/3.

answers.default: C# Compilation and .NET Integration - Compile C# code for Prolog pipelines using external compilation (dotnet build) or pre-compilation (Add-Type). Supports NuGet dependencies and LiteDB integration. Solves DLL file locking issues by using unique build directories.
answers.all-MiniLM-L6-v2: C# compilation: external_compile (dotnet build) or pre_compile (Add-Type). Supports NuGet and LiteDB. Handles file locking.
answers.e5-small-v2: C# Compilation - Integrate C# in pipelines. Use external_compile for SDK builds or pre_compile for Add-Type. Features LiteDB support and file locking solutions.
